body:
Git pull origin - go in to ./src/univalue

./autogen.sh
./configure
make

make clean and two different coins attempted with same results.
OSX 10.14.6 (Mojave)

Please advise if this is incompatibility or if I'm missing something :)

title: OSX Mojave (10.14.6) build fails compiling univalue
